languages.text: "Ты совершенно прав{mf||а}! Только спасать им нужно вовсе не свои жизни — их души, вот что в настоящей опасности".

traits.locale_text: "Ты совершенно прав{mf||а}! Только спасать им нужно вовсе не свои жизни — их души, вот что в настоящей опасности".
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "You are entirely right! But it is not their lives that they should be saving: it is their souls that are truly in peril."
languages.original_text: "Ты совершенно прав{mf||а}! Только спасать им нужно вовсе не свои жизни — их души, вот что в настоящей опасности".

languages.text: “你说得一点都没错！不过，我们该拯救的并不是他们的生命，而是他们岌岌可危的灵魂。”
languages.original_text: "You are entirely right! But it is not their lives that they should be saving: it is their souls that are truly in peril."

traits.locale_text: “你说得一点都没错！不过，我们该拯救的并不是他们的生命，而是他们岌岌可危的灵魂。”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: 「お前は実に正しい！だが、彼らが救うべきなのは自分自身の命ではない。その魂にこそ、危険が差し迫っているのだ」
languages.original_text: "You are entirely right! But it is not their lives that they should be saving: it is their souls that are truly in peril."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は実に正しい！だが、彼らが救うべきなのは自分自身の命ではない。その魂にこそ、危険が差し迫っているのだ」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: «¡Tiene toda la razón! Pero no son sus vidas lo que deberían salvar, son sus almas las que están en peligro».
languages.original_text: "You are entirely right! But it is not their lives that they should be saving: it is their souls that are truly in peril."

traits.locale_text: «¡Tiene toda la razón! Pero no son sus vidas lo que deberían salvar, son sus almas las que están en peligro».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Ihr habt vollkommen recht! Doch es sind nicht ihre Leben, die sie retten sollten. Es sind ihre Seelen, die sich in wahrer Gefahr befinden."
languages.original_text: "You are entirely right! But it is not their lives that they should be saving: it is their souls that are truly in peril."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt vollkommen recht! Doch es sind nicht ihre Leben, die sie retten sollten. Es sind ihre Seelen, die sich in wahrer Gefahr befinden."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: « Et vous avez entièrement raison ! Mais plus que leur vie, c'est leur âme qu'ils devraient chercher à sauver. »
languages.original_text: "You are entirely right! But it is not their lives that they should be saving: it is their souls that are truly in peril."

traits.locale_text: « Et vous avez entièrement raison ! Mais plus que leur vie, c'est leur âme qu'ils devraient chercher à sauver. »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Son derece haklısın! Lakin kurtarılması gereken, hayatları değil. Asıl tehlike altında olan, ruhları."
languages.original_text: "You are entirely right! But it is not their lives that they should be saving: it is their souls that are truly in peril."

traits.locale_text: "Son derece haklısın! Lakin kurtarılması gereken şey hayatları değil, asıl tehlike altında olan şey ruhları."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04
